meanings.definition: To remove the contents of (a body cavity)
meanings.sent1: The surgeon carefully exenterates the tumor from the patient's abdomen.
meanings.sent2: The zookeeper exenterates the fish tank to clean it thoroughly.
meanings.sent3: The chef exenterates the pumpkin to prepare a delicious soup.
meanings.sent4: The archaeologist exenterates the burial site to uncover ancient artifacts.
meanings.sent5: The mechanic exenterates the engine to repair the damaged parts.

meanings.sent1: The hunter exenterates the deer after a successful hunt.
meanings.sent2: The predator exenterates its prey to consume it.
meanings.sent3: The zombie exenterates the scarecrow in search of brains.
meanings.sent4: The monster exenterates its victims in the horror movie.
meanings.sent5: The butcher exenterates the chicken before cooking it.

meanings.definition: To remove or extract the internal organs of
meanings.sent1: The coroner exenterates the body during the autopsy.
meanings.sent2: The scientist exenterates the specimen for further analysis.
meanings.sent3: The alien exenterates the spaceship to understand its technology.
meanings.sent4: The witch exenterates the potion ingredients for her spell.
meanings.sent5: The farmer exenterates the livestock for inspection.
